events.message: I would like to request a refund for the headphones I purchased last week because they never arrived and the tracking information has not updated.
The support system has categorized the issue as a Refund case due to the customer's request for money back related to undelivered goods.
An agent from the billing and refunds department has been assigned to handle this refund request for the missing headphones order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like a refund for your order that hasn't arrived yet. I'll be happy to help you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so I can check the status and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The tracking says it was shipped but hasn't moved from the sorting center for days.
Thank you for the details. Since your package appears to be lost in transit, I will initiate a full refund immediately. You should see the amount credited within 5 to 7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate you processing the refund promptly.
The refund process has been completed and confirmed. Please check your bank account in a few days, and let us know if there are any further issues.
We are following up to ensure that your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with our resolution.
Since the refund was successful and the customer has expressed satisfaction, the case is now closed. Thank you for reaching out to us.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your experience with our support service. Your feedback helps us improve.
